title: iPhone Showing the Wrong Location? Here's How to Fix It

steps.title: Enable Location Services.
steps.content: Enable Location Services. This feature must be enabled to use apps such as Find My , Apple Maps , and more. If you don't have this enabled, your location may be incorrect. Do the following: Open the Settings app. Tap Privacy & Security . Tap Location Services . Toggle on Location Services . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Make sure you have cellular or Wi-Fi access.
steps.content: Make sure you have cellular or Wi-Fi access. If you're in an area with poor signal, your location won't be able to update properly until you're connected again. If you're on cellular data, you may need to check your data usage to see if you have enough data to spare.

steps.title: Restart your device.
steps.content: Restart your device. A quick restart can fix common issues. Do the following: On iPhones without a Home button, press and hold the Power button and Volume Up button until the Power slider appears. On iPhones with a Home button, press and hold the side button until the slider appears. Slide the slider with your finger and wait for your iPhone to turn off. Wait 30 seconds, and then turn it back on.

steps.title: Toggle on automatic Date & Time.
steps.content: Toggle on automatic Date & Time. When this feature is toggled off, it may cause some issues with certain apps. Do the following: Open the Settings app. Tap General . Tap Date & Time . Toggle on Set Automatically .

steps.title: Factory reset your location settings.
steps.content: Factory reset your location settings. When these settings are reset, apps will need to ask for permission to use your location again. Do the following: Open the Settings app. Tap General . Tap Transfer or Reset iPhone . Tap Reset . Tap Reset Location & Privacy .

steps.title: Keep your iPhone up-to-date.
steps.content: Keep your iPhone up-to-date . Software updates include common bug fixes. Do the following: Go to Settings . Tap General . Tap Software Update . Tap Download and Install .
